name: Indian Women And Children Foundation
briefDescription: Indian Women and Children Foundation (IWCF) is a Non Governmental, Non Profit, Community Based Developmental Organization working in the Urban, Semi-Urban, Rural areas as well as in the Tribal pockets of the Bhiwandi , Shahapur and Vasai Tehsil of Thane District, since 2002.As it is mentioned in the name, the foundation basically works for the all round development of the Under- privileged women and children. It strives for strengthening the Socio-Economical development through continuous and focused community interventions.
